title: BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Says Entering Surety Market In Australia By Reuters
text:
BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Says Entering Surety Market In Australia

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 10:14)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Says Entering Surety Market In Australia Oct 20 (Reuters) - Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: ) Specialty Insurance : * BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY SPECIALTY INSURANCE - ANNOUNCED IT IS ENTERING SURETY MARKET IN AUSTRALIA AND NAMES JONATHAN GRIFFITHS AS HEAD OF SURETY, AUSTRALIA

BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Says Entering Surety Market In Australia
